commit message: add alternate note naming conventions to Settings, rename unit tests from chordfinder to chordreader
added two-line display for the note naming convention in the settings
load chord dictionary in the background
fix some namings for Maj7, add power chords (add5), and incorporate 2nd chord dictionary for anything the first might have missed
show guitar fingering variations in the popup
string changes and fix NPE when there are no guitar chord fingerings
fix some bugs in the chord filtering heuristics
turn off debug mode in UtilLogger
rename everything from ChordFinder (the working name) to ChordReader
